long_description: The Clarks Wave.Trek shoes are crafted of rich, waterproof full-grain leather with removable OrthoLite(R) footbeds for comfort on city sidewalks or country lanes, rain or shine. Tough, lasting waterproof leather uppers keep your feet dry when you're splashing through puddles. Innovative curved rocker sole conserves energy, absorbs shock and cushions the joints to enhance the walking experience. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support. Nylon shanks supply stability and support on uneven terrain. Rubber outsoles on the Clarks Wave.Trek boots offer everyday traction.
short_description: The Clarks Wave.Trek shoes are crafted of rich, waterproof full-grain leather with removable OrthoLite(R) footbeds for comfort on city sidewalks or country lanes, rain or shine.
